snippet: NADIEN--David W.,88, died unexpectedly May 28th. Beloved husband of Margot Nadien. Survived by loving nieces, nephews, cousins and caring violin students. Private Funeral and Shiva. Memorial Service to be announced....

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NADIEN, DAVID W.

lead_paragraph: NADIEN--David W.,88, died unexpectedly May 28th. Beloved husband of Margot Nadien. Survived by loving nieces, nephews, cousins and caring violin students. Private Funeral and Shiva. Memorial Service to be announced.
